Dear e!DAL-$reviewerType reviewer,
we recently recieved a data publication request by $principal.
Please check the submission carefully and state if it can be published as $id data publication.
preview: $infos_string
As e!DAL managing reviewer you have the final decision to accepted or rejected. #if($embargo)
NOTE: An embargo date was set to $embargo ! #else #end
YES , the submission can be published online as DOI featured citable data reference
NO , I have major doubts and reject the submission.
Thanks for your kind support,
The e!DAL research data publication system!
